text: Dimaadua ga helekai mai, “Maa nei bolo Moses mo Samuel ne tuu gi nua, ga dangidangi i digaula hagamahi mai gi di Au, gei Au e hagalee manawa dumaalia ang gi nia daangada aanei. Heia digaula gii hula gi daha mo Au! Heia digaula gi hagalee i ogu mua!15.1 Exodus 32.11-14; Numbers 14.13-19; 1 Samuel 7.5-9
